Still, it was perfect for a Dorothy (wizard of oz) costume if you want a longer skirt.

I dressed as Dorothy for Halloween, and this dress was perfect for the occasion. Quite flattering, and I received many compliments and propositions.  The fit was true to size, and made quite well for the price. It works great without a bra, but you could certainly use a strapless if your girls need the boost. The fabric is slightly thin, but not see through. It held up well for the night, and I’m sure I will wear it again.

I REEEAAAALLLLLLY wish it were cotton, but I love this dress. The fit is very flattering, I can wear a regular bra with it, and it's lightweight.  I feel pretty in it. I got the bluish-green one with little daisies all over it. It's cute for spring and summer, and I can even cheat it into fall with a cute jacket and boots.  The fabric is a thin polyester, but the stitching is solid.  I had bought another pattern, a colorful chevron one, but the pattern was upside down on the back of the dress and I hated it. I recommend the smaller patterned ones.
Very flattering dress. Nice material, true to size and flowy. Definitely intend to buy more colors!
